title: The testaments of the [twelue] patriarches the sonnes [of] Iacob: translated out of the Greeke [into] Latine by Robert Grosthed, some[time] Byshop of Lyncolne, and out of his copye into French and Dutch by others: Now Englished by A. G. To the credit whereof an auncient Greeke copye written in parchment, is kept in the Vniversitie Library of Cambridge.
author: Gilby, Anthony, ca. 1510-1585.
publisher: Printed by Iohn Day [and J. Kingston], dwelling ouer Aldersgate,
